website_summaries.verdict: Trusted brand name in cleaning products that works on many different kitchen surfaces.
pros: Uses a spray bottle that can be held in any orientation to reach tight spaces
Works for stainless steel, countertops, and faucets
Doesn't use abrasive chemicals, so it won't scratch surfaces
cons: May leave a noticeable film on some surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Photo shows the left side cleaned
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Photo shows the left side cleaned. Be careful about spraying directly on your appliances; I made that mistake and the overspray got onto the floor and made it very slippery.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca h

customer_reviews.title: ENDUST!  Why can I not find this in any stores.
customer_reviews.text: I did my research. The Endust Stainless Steel Cleaner, was rated the BEST by most appliance companies and websites. Went to go find some, but, nope, not in any stores. Thank goodness for Amazon and two day shipping. This stuff is AMAZING. I was skeptical when I used it. A lot of these cleaners don't work very well, but this one make your appliances shiny and not streaky and cleans. I have always liked this brand, and this is a good stainless steel cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: TLMKC

customer_reviews.title: Solid stainless cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cleaner I have found so far for my stainless appliances. I have tried a more pricey option and an all natural product and neither work as well as this one. Just be careful not to get any in the floor or you will be slipping and sliding! I usually spray onto a microfiber cloth and clean and buff with a clean microfiber cloth. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kimberjmb

customer_reviews.title: No STREAKS - it really works.
customer_reviews.text: Wow- finally my years of searching for an effective SS cleaner is over. I just threw out all of the others brands that have disappointed me for so long. This stuff is great and really works. It’s too bad I have never seen it in stores, but as long as I can get it here I’m good.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Brown

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many brands. So many bad ones. I would need to wax on wax off to make them work, but this brand is so different. It's spray on, wipe dry. It's fantastic. Cleans and shines. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H

customer_reviews.title: Best stainless steel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I find that stainless steel is difficult to care for with its tendency to streak and spot. I've tried numerous cleaners with little success, until trying this Endust one. I used it on my refrigerator, stove dishwasher, microwave oven and trash compactor and was very pleased. It cleaned, didn't streak and left a shine without being greasy. Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: honeybee57

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.text: This Endust Stainless Steel Cleaner does the job. I’ve tried numerous brands that worked from fair to okay but this Endust Cleaner is, without a doubt, the best I’ve ever tried. I’ll positively be purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: maureen2455

customer_reviews.title: So good, I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This Endust cleaner is so good, I will continue to purchase it. I feel like I have to clean my fridge less when I use it
customer_reviews.author: Damaris

customer_reviews.title: Best stainless steel cleaning I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: No streaking. I use it with a microfiber cloth (glass cleaning weave) and it works perfectly. Will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: MGSFamily

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ENDUST
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several cleansers. Endust has surpassed anything I used for my stainless steel appliances. The cleanser is easy to use and the appliances look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: It made my stainless steel worse - streaks no matter how many times you buff it Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great stainless steal cleaner!!!! Best I have ever had. Doesn’t stay greasy. Smells good. Easy to clean and take off. Not like other products
customer_reviews.author: rcolac

customer_reviews.title: Arrrived shattered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two bottles of this, on for me and one for my daughter because it worked so well. However, they both arrived with the plastic tops completely shattered, so that you can not even spray them. Still trying to figure out how to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, recommend by a housekeeper to me.
customer_reviews.text: Tried many stainless steel cleaners and this makes everything shine but not oily. My Housekeeper recommended this brand.
customer_reviews.author: jancas_is_here

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t use. Spray cap broken. This is part 2 of this review! Amazon replaced my broken can. New one works great. Makes my stainless steel appliances shine like new. Also, helps with fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Dee cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stainless cleaner that I have ever used. It made the bar-b-q look new.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Smells great and works great!! Best SS Cleaner i've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy JJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used it and I like it, the end result is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Albania

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great item at an affordable price. Works better than the more expensive items and doesn’t smear!
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great! No streaks! Put a towel on the floor though as the mist does settle there.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work as good as I was hoping, thinking I’ll spend more money on another product
customer_reviews.author: Zana Weigold

customer_reviews.title: my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is good stuff! I've tried all kinds of different cleaners, and this works the best.
customer_reviews.author: North Gate Outlander

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to use due to the spray nozzle bring broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Bell

customer_reviews.title: Leaves an oily film.
customer_reviews.text: Left an oily film on my Samsung refrigerator. This would not buff off.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other products but this is by far the best! My stainless appliances have never looked this good. Fast and easy,too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far one of the best in the market. Do recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Evora

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: the star rating should be enough for most products... forcing us to write something before it will except the rating is nonsense ! and then bombarding my emails until i write a review it annoying , if i chose to write a review i will stop the harassing emails!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel life

customer_reviews.title: Endust Stainless Steel Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: My stainless steel appliances were the bane of my cleaning existence, no matter how hard I tried I would see streaks. Endust Stainless Steel Cleaner works great and gave me the results I want. I have experimented and learned that a little goes a long way and I will definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I think they is a good product, but ...
customer_reviews.text: may be be made for stainless sinks, which is specifically what I bought it for as I don't have stainless appliances. It really smells wonderful. It makes the sink look nice doesn't seem to hold up long. Maybe that's because it's really for appliances and not sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Nikilet

customer_reviews.title: Less streaky than some
customer_reviews.text: It's just like the other brands. I had hoped I could get scratches out with it. No luck. WD40 works better at hiding scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: My cleaning lady loves this product...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does a nice job, at first spray it appears to be "greasy", but after a few good wipes it shines and looks nice. Prevents dust from collecting on my range hood.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as it should
customer_reviews.text: Directions are clear and easy to follow and leaves a beautiful finish on my stainless steel appliances. I do it about once a month once it starts to look a little grimey and it holds up well over that periods. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works GREAT! We have stainless steel everything and hard to keep clean with kids. It also seems to protect from smudges a bit after you use it, although not sure if that’s just my imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Ley-z1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We have all stainless appliances, plus an out door kitchen with the same, the shine was brilliant! Guess what no streaks and the pool hand rail looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Sparetyme

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel cleaner that works very well.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner works well without being too harsh. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane VanZile

customer_reviews.title: Endust is the best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stainless steel cleaner I ever bought. It is streak free. I didn't know endust made this. Can't find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Maria I.

customer_reviews.title: Best Stainless Steel Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Even when cleaning your kitchen appliances once a week they come out new. Better if you spray and clean spots or areas with a soft cloth when something spills on them. It leaves no residues.
customer_reviews.author: VEC

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fast delivery. Love it for cleaning the grill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does not streak
customer_reviews.text: This is the only stainless cleaner that I found that does not streak.... Love it
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Skebeck

customer_reviews.title: This product was so amazing and so cheap I was not expecting such results
customer_reviews.text: This product was so amazing and so cheap I was not expecting such results. I sprayed it on and fingerprints were amazingly gone definitely will buy another bottle
customer_reviews.author: Andree K.

customer_reviews.title: This was an amazing find for me
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing find for me. I've been going crazy trying to find a product that works on my SS refrigerator!! This is it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra N. Mcgarry

customer_reviews.title: It’s more like a wax
customer_reviews.text: It’s more like a wax. Than spray and wipe. You have to rub hard to shine. What I do like, once shined up.,finger prints smudges show up less.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Eley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works really good but if you don’t wipe it really fast you get streaks
customer_reviews.author: Wild Irish Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly one of the best stainless steel cleaners on the market I’ve tried many for my business on cleaning
customer_reviews.author: cheryl sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on all our stainless steel appliances. Easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Oceanview

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best stainless cleaners I have found.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Works better than anything else I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great and not greasy or smudgy. Smells lemony and it will leave your stainless clean and glossy. I used with a mircrofiber cloth. I love it, will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Merryck

product_meta.title: Endust Stainless Steel Cleaner, 12.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Endust Stainless Steel Cleaner is designed to quickly clean away dust, dirt, fingerprints and water spots from your stainless steel. The non-abrasive formula will provide a protective streak-free shine with minimal rub-out. Works great on kitchen appliances, sinks, faucets, countertops, grills and more.
feature_bullets: Designed to quickly clean away dust, dirt, fingerprints and water spots from your stainless steel
Non-abrasive formula will provide a protective streak-free shine with minimal rub-out
Works great on kitchen appliances, sinks, faucets, countertops, grills and more
Sprays upside down, making it easier to clean areas lower to the ground

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
